BTW 

***PS3 REGION DOES NOT MATTER***

All games are region "UNLOCKED", so don't worry about not being able to play.

To put straight on Ps3, use the PS3 FTP Server package, an application you can install if you jailbroke your PS3.

Works with PSGroove 1.1 on Teensy 2.0 Board.
Took me 7 hours to upload via FTP :(

But about the game. Great Engine, the game-play is pretty decent. Its 3rd person and really does bring about a nice story focus for once. The cinematic camera angles are awesome, and the graphics are good, besides the naked girls looking fake and rubbery (lol). Overall, great Game.
Mafia.2.PS3.READ.NFO-DUPLEX [PSJ]

This is my first time trying a ps3 iso. But from what ive read, if your transfering the game file to your ps3 via ftp you will need the game ID to be the proper BLESXXXXX. This games ID is BLES00521. You can find out ps3 game ids by using "PS3SFOEDIT" and navigating to the .sfo file in the game folder. Rename the Mafia.2. folder so that it is like this. So if your using ftp to transfer this game should be like this âdev_hdd0/game/LAUN12345/GAMEZ/BLES00521/PS3_Disc.SFB , PS3_GAME, and PS3_UPDATE.â
